name: team espn line win rates with matchup_opponent_type param
description: Test case for team espn line win rates with matchup_opponent_type param
expected_query: with "current_week_opponents" as (select "h" as "nfl_team", "v" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "week" = ${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_week} and "seas_type" = '${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_type}' union select "v" as "nfl_team", "h" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "week" = ${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_week} and "seas_type" = '${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_type}') select "player"."pid", "t2ef31fd05a4f03366c134047f2115de0"."run_block_win_rate" AS "espn_team_run_block_win_rate_0", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "current_week_opponents" on "player"."current_nfl_team" = "current_week_opponents"."nfl_team" left join "espn_team_win_rates_index" as "t2ef31fd05a4f03366c134047f2115de0" on "t2ef31fd05a4f03366c134047f2115de0"."team" = "current_week_opponents"."opponent" and "t2ef31fd05a4f03366c134047f2115de0"."year" = 2024 where player.pos IN ('TEAM') group by "t2ef31fd05a4f03366c134047f2115de0"."run_block_win_rate", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
